data.lyric:
[ti:Selah]
[ar:Kanye West]
[al:JESUS IS KING]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Selah - Kanye West
[00:15.02]God is King we the soldiers
[00:17.14]Ultrabeam out the solar
[00:18.92]When I get to Heaven's gates
[00:20.66]I ain't gotta peak over
[00:22.61]Keepin' perfect composure
[00:24.45]When I scream at the chauffeur
[00:26.22]I ain't mean I'm just focused
[00:28.14]I ain't mean I'm just focused
[00:30.01]Pour the lean out slower
[00:31.85]Got us clean out of soda
[00:33.54]Before the flood people judge
[00:35.42]They did the same thing to Noah
[00:37.39]Everybody wanted Yandhi
[00:38.91]Then Jesus Christ did the laundry
[00:40.88]They say the week start on Monday
[00:42.78]But the strong start on Sunday
[00:44.60]Won't be in bondage to any man
[00:46.72]John 8：33 we the descendants of Abraham
[00:50.39]Ye should be made free John 8：36
[00:53.96]To whom the son set free is free indeed
[00:57.67]He saved a wretch like me
[00:59.10]Hallelujah hallelujah hallelujah hallelujah
[01:02.77]Hallelujah hallelujah hallelujah hallelujah
[01:06.81]Hallelujah hallelujah hallelujah hallelujah
[01:10.84]Hallelujah hallelujah hallelujah hallelujah
[01:15.05]Hallelujah hallelujah hallelujah hallelujah
[01:19.06]Hallelujah hallelujah hallelujah hallelujah
[01:23.21]Hallelujah hallelujah hallelujah hallelujah
[01:27.17]Hallelujah hallelujah hallelujah hallelujah
[01:31.34]Hallelujah hallelujah hallelujah hallelujah
[01:35.33]Hallelujah hallelujah hallelujah hallelujah
[01:39.45]Hallelujah he is wonderful
[01:48.27]If you woke then wake up
[01:49.86]With Judas kiss and make up
[01:51.97]Even with the bitter cup
[01:53.63]Forgave my brothers and drank up
[01:55.34]Did everything but gave up
[01:57.09]Stab my back I can't front
[01:58.90]Still we win we prayed up
[02:00.62]Even when we die we raise up
[02:02.60]Ain't no wantin' no we need it
[02:04.44]The powers that be done been greedy
[02:06.28]We need our by evening
[02:08.10]No white flag or treaty
[02:09.90]We got the product we got the tools
[02:11.81]We got the mind we got the youth
[02:13.59]We goin' wild we on the loose
[02:15.47]People is lying we are the truth
[02:17.36]Everything old shall now become new
[02:19.10]The leaves will be green bearing the fruit
[02:20.90]Love God and our neighbor as written in Luke
[02:22.77]The army of God and we are the truth
data.trans:
[ti:Selah]
[ar:Kanye West]
[al:JESUS IS KING]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:15.02]上帝是国王 我们是士兵
[00:17.14]阳光一样温暖
[00:18.92]当我抵达天堂大门
[00:20.66]我就不用拼尽全力
[00:22.61]保持冷静
[00:24.45]不要对别人吼叫
[00:26.22]我不是坏人 我只是太认真
[00:28.14]我不是坏人 我只是太认真
[00:30.01]慢慢倒出特制饮料
[00:31.85]让我们别再喝汽水
[00:33.54]灾难爆发之前 人们批评我
[00:35.42]他们当初对诺亚也是这样
[00:37.39]每个人都想见识一下Yandhi
[00:38.91]然后耶稣洗净了人间罪恶
[00:40.88]他们说每周的第一天是周一
[00:42.78]但真正的强者在周日就开始努力
[00:44.60]不会被任何人奴役
[00:46.72]约翰福音8章33节 我们是亚伯拉罕的后裔
[00:50.39]Kanye应该获得自由 约翰福音8章36节
[00:53.96]他获得的自由是真正的自由
[00:57.67]主拯救了我这样的恶棍
[00:59.10]哈利路亚
[01:02.77]哈利路亚
[01:06.81]哈利路亚
[01:10.84]哈利路亚
[01:15.05]哈利路亚
[01:19.06]哈利路亚
[01:23.21]哈利路亚
[01:27.17]哈利路亚
[01:31.34]哈利路亚
[01:35.33]哈利路亚
[01:39.45]哈利路亚 主多么了不起
[01:48.27]如果你醒了 那就清醒过来
[01:49.86]和犹大握手言和
[01:51.97]即使命运不堪
[01:53.63]也原谅了我的兄弟 一饮而尽
[01:55.34]无论如何也没有放弃
[01:57.09]背后伤害我 我无法伪装
[01:58.90]我们依然会胜利 我们祈祷上帝
[02:00.62]即使我们死去 我们也会升天
[02:02.60]不会等待 我们迫不及待
[02:04.44]权力让人变得贪婪
[02:06.28]我们也需要属于自己的东西
[02:08.10]决不投降 决不妥协
[02:09.90]我们有作品 我们有能力
[02:11.81]我们有思想 我们有青春
[02:13.59]我们狂放 我们不羁
[02:15.47]人人都在撒谎 我们就是真理
[02:17.36]一切古老的事物都会焕然一新
[02:19.10]树叶会变绿 孕育着果实
[02:20.90]就像路加福音中写的那样 爱上帝 也要爱我们的邻居
[02:22.77]我们是上帝的战士 我们就是真理
